999790.name: Fantasy Grounds - Monstrous Lair #10: Mummy’s Crypt (Any Ruleset)
999790.description:
Monstrous Lair #10: Mummy's Crypt

Monstrous Lair #10: Mummy's Crypt provides you--the busy, time-crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the mummy's crypts in your campaign.
Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your adventures, dungeons and campaign to life?
This short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your dungeons. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation.
  • 7 rollable tables
  • A story template to generate the mummy's crypt in one click
  • Full reference manual
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Potter
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
